org.nasdanika.common.persistence

Interface ContextStorable


  • public interface ContextStorable
    Objects which know how to store themselves to a Map, List, or scalar like String, Number, Boolean or Date may implement this interface so they can be stored to a hierarchical structure like YAML or JSON. Also this interface may be used as an adapter interface. In this case an object to be stored is adapted to this interface.
    Author:
    Pavel
